TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionList extends System.Object

summary.span: 为定义用于创建智能标记面板的项列表的类型提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for types that define a list of items used to create a smart tag panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DesignerAction`功能，组件和控件以显示上下文相关的信息和命令。The `DesignerAction` feature enables components and controls to display context-sensitive information and commands. `DesignerAction`功能可以被认为是以替换设计器谓词，因为可以显示智能标记面板中以及与组件或控件关联的快捷菜单中。The `DesignerAction` feature can be thought of as a replacement for designer verbs, because a can be displayed in the smart tag panel and also in the shortcut menu associated with a component or control. 类表示主交互点有关向其自定义组件和控件支持的开发人员想要添加智能标记。The class represents the main point of interaction for developers who want to add smart tag support to their custom components and controls. 是为了填充智能标记面板组件开发人员通过派生自的基类。 is the base class, derived from by component developers in order to populate a smart tag panel. 智能标记面板表示智能标记菜单类似用户界面 (UI)。A smart tag panel represents the menu-like user interface (UI) for smart tags. 此派生的类可以实现`virtual`方法返回的对象的集合派生自。This derived class may implement the `virtual` method to return a collection of objects derived from . 这些对象表示智能标记面板项。These objects represent the smart tag panel items. 每个项显示在面板中根据其类型。Each item is displayed in the panel according to its type. 例如，显示为静态文本标签。For example, a is displayed as a static text label. 活动的控制面板项，为由和类型，具有相应的可公开访问属性或方法，分别用于实现该项目的功能。Active panel items, represented by the and types, have a corresponding publicly accessible property or method, respectively, that implements the functionality for that item. 有关如何将项添加到智能标记面板的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about how to add items to the smart tag panel, see the method. > [!NOTE] > 可由派生类的成员显示窗体和对话框。Forms and dialog boxes can be displayed by members of the class derived from . 默认情况下，这些窗口的父级将智能标记面板的容器窗口。By default, the parent of these windows will be the container window for the smart tag panel. 显式作为父级到另一个服务或窗口中这些子窗口可能会导致显示不正确的智能标记。Explicitly parenting these child windows to another service or window may cause smart tags to display improperly. > > 智能标记面板不支持滚动或分页，因此请小心，不要与多个智能标记项面板中填充。Smart-tag panels do not support scrolling or paging, so be careful not to populate your panels with many smart-tag items. 过多的项可能会导致超出屏幕边界的智能标记面板。Too many items may result in the smart-tag panel extending beyond the screen boundary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 此代码示例的完整说明，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数设置属性设置为`false`。The constructor sets the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 此代码示例的完整说明，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示智能标记面板在创建后是否应自动显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the smart tag panel should automatically be displayed when it is created.

value.span: 如果在所属组件创建后应显示面板，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the panel should be shown when the owning component is created; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性值设置为`true`，与此组件是关联的将自动展开并显示智能标记面板时创建组件。If the property value is set to `true`, the component with which this is associated will automatically expand and display the smart tag panel when the component is created. 可以通过设置选择退出此行为属性设置为`false`。You can opt out of this behavior by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 此代码示例的完整说明，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItemCollection GetSortedActionItems() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSortedActionItems () As DesignerActionItemCollection

abstract member GetSortedActionItems : unit -> System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItemCollection override this.GetSortedActionItems : unit -> System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItemCollection

summary.span: 返回包含在列表中的 对象的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of objects contained in the list.

returns.span: 数组，包含此列表中的项。

span.span: A array that contains the items in this list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `virtual` 方法实现要返回，请在预期显示顺序，从派生的对象的集合类。The `virtual` method is implemented to return, in the expected display order, a collection of objects derived from the class. 这些项可以是以下特定类型。These items can be of the following specific types. |类型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||组标签，以粗体显示。The group label, displayed in bold.| ||一个标签，显示在普通字体。A label, displayed in a plain font.| ||一个与属性项相关联的面板。A panel item associated with a property. 此外可能会显示复选标记或与基础属性相关联的属性编辑器。May also display a check mark or property editor associated with the underlying property.| ||控制面板项显示为超链接，与方法关联。A panel item displayed as a hyperlink and associated with a method.| 对于每个并，必须将相应的方法或属性添加到的程序员提供的类派生自类。For every and , a corresponding method or property must be added to the programmer-supplied class derived from the class. 每个方法和属性的项显示为活动状态的项;与其进行交互，通过用户界面 (UI) 调用相应的方法或属性，分别。Each method and property item is displayed as an active entry; interacting with it through the user interface (UI) invokes the corresponding method or property, respectively. 属性项具有一个特殊的控制面板项界面，让显示器和其相应的属性值的操作。Property items have a special panel-item interface that enables display and manipulation of their corresponding property values. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 返回数组中的项的顺序反映它们将显示在面板中的顺序。The order of the items in the returned array reflects the order that they will appear in the panel. 项的分组依据属性，使用以下规则：The items are grouped according to the property, using the following rules: - 遇到的第一项的类别表示第一个组开始。The category of the first item encountered signifies the start of the first group. 该组将继续，只要每个后续项属于同一类别。That group continues as long as each succeeding item is of the same category. 当遇到的不同，新类别的项时，创建一个新组并将项放在其中。When an item of a different, new category is encountered, a new group is created and the item is placed in it. - 如果项具有不同于当前组的类型，但已使用该类别，将项放在匹配的现有类别。If an item has a type different than the current group, but that category has already been used, the item is placed in the matching existing category. - 如果项不具有一个类别，则将它放置在面板的最终杂项组中。If an item does not have a category, it is placed in a miscellaneous group at the end of the panel. 此组还包含项目的属性设置为`false`。This group also contains items whose property is set to `false`. 面板首次创建时调用方法。The method is called when the panel is first created. 必须调用方法来更新的面板中显示的项的列表。You must call the method to update the list of items displayed in the panel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 此代码示例的完整说明，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a complete explanation of this code example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]
